author: Ivan Mehta
title: Pornhub is making its service free worldwide to cure your lockdown blues
description: After offering free subscriptions in Italy, Spain, and France, adult entertainment site Pornhub is making its subscription free for everyone across the world — with a view to help to flatten the curve amid lockdowns around the world. The company sai
